text: Euphorbia abdelkuri is a species of plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is endemic to Abd al Kuri, an island south of Yemen. Its natural habitat is rocky areas. The Latex of the plant is toxic. == References == abdelkuri Category:Endemic flora of Socotra Category:Endangered flora of Asia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Isaac Bayley Balfour
title: Euphorbia abdelkuri
